otherprojects.title: Personal Website
description: You are looking at it! This is the second version of my personal website.
The site was originally written using Bootstrap, but I rewrote the styles using Tailwind CSS.
This is used for my portfolio and to showcase my skills!

otherprojects.title: Math Tutor
description: Math Tutor was my final project for the Applied Programming Languages class. The application was developed by myself and a partner.
It tutors students in mathematics with a dynamic leveling and points system.

otherprojects.title: Personal Blog
description: This project is my blog. I wrote it using Astro and Tailwind CSS.
I write about anything that piques my interest, typically movies and music!

otherprojects.title: Live Blog
description: Final project in the Software Engineering class that was developed as part of a Scrum Team using Agile Scrum development methodology.
This allows users to sign in and write blogs on their favorite topics.

otherprojects.title: Movie Deck
description: This was the final project in the Web and Distributed Programming class.
It was my first usage of a modern front-end framework.
This application allows users to sign in and rate their favorite movies.

otherprojects.title: Music Database
description: This was my final project in the Database Systems class.
This project was my first introduction to PHP. I wrote an SQL database,
a PHP backend, and a Bootstrap 5 frontend. The application enables users to do CRUD functions with their favorite music.
